title: Escaping from a lion in a dream

preview.html: Therefore, today in this article we will present to you the interpretation of seeing a lion running in a dream, so follow us in the following lines through your website gptafser.com/.Interpretation of seeing a lion running in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees a lion in a dream, this means that he is an enemy. While An unmarried girl saw a lion in her dream and it attacked her. This is a sign of anxiety and distress that she will be exposed to recently. But if an unmarried girl sees a lion in a dream and eats its meat, this indicates that she will be given a human being. Or her benefit and ambition will succeed and it will succeed, God willing, and God knows best. And see. Also: Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of seeing a lion fleeing in a dream for a married womanHere we can say that seeing a lion in a dream is different for a married woman, as all interpreters agree. All scholars and commentators have confirmed the difference in meaning between a married and an unmarried woman. The lion is considered Who dreams of a married woman who is worried about herself, her husband, and her children. One of the interpretations of this vision is that it indicates the presence of people trying to ruin her life. It causes her many problems in her married life as well as in her public life. But if the lion is eliminated, this portends abundant goodness. Increase Nutrition and improving the financial condition of this woman and her family. Interpretation of seeing a man running away in a dream means: If a man sees in a dream that he is drinking the milk of a lion, this is a bad vision. Its meaning is that this man will marry a bad and immoral girl. But if the man sees a lion in his dream, this means that he will be exposed to treachery. And treachery. And that there is an enemy in his life who is trying to harm him in his presence. Seeing lion fur in a dream is a sign that the one who saw the dream can achieve all his ambitions. Scientists and commentators say that seeing lion fur in a dream is a good dream. Which indicates that the dreamer’s life Coming, then he will have a lot of sustenance and a blessed life. But if one sees in his dream that he is kissing a lion, it means that he will receive a lot of money. He will also receive a great livelihood and an abundance of goodness in his next life. But if the sleeper sees in his dream that a lion is growing If She saw a lion in her dream, which means that she is pregnant with a boy. The pregnant woman also suffers from severe fatigue during pregnancy, and also from many psychological fluctuations that make her see in her sleep the problems that she suffers from. A pregnant woman sees a lion in a dream, which indicates that her condition Health is not good. Some commentators also say that a pregnant woman’s vision of a lion indicates her strength and that she will give birth to her child in good health and peace. Likewise, if she sees a lot of young people, this indicates her ability to take responsibility and the ability to raise them and provide them with what they need. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about eating pastrami completely?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing pastrami in a dream. Basturma is known to be made from dried and salted beef in the countryside and is heavily seasoned in Armenian and Ottoman cuisine. Also, seeing basturma in a dream is one of the things that many people dream about, so we presented to you, our favorite followers, what is the interpretation of seeing eggs with basturma, buying them, selling them, and boiling them. And cook it. We also collected the interpretation of seeing pastrami for women, married and pregnant women, as well as for men, through the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. What is the interpretation of seeing eating pastrami by Ibn Sirin? The interpretation of seeing pastrami in a dream is complete, as narrated by Ibn Sirin, as evidence of dry relationships and boredom with certain things. In the life of the dreamer. Also, dreaming of buying whole pastrami is a sign of good luck and you are entering a period filled with many positive changes. Dreaming of eating dried meat is full of visions that indicate recovery from illness, relief from worries and problems, and a sign of relief from distress. Eating Pastrami and then vomiting in a complete dream indicates the sins committed by the dreamer and extreme distance from God and a sign of negligence in prayer. What is the interpretation of seeing a woman eating pastrami in a bowl? The interpretation of seeing pastrami in a complete dream for a poor woman is evidence of the goodness and justice of her position in religion and life. And a sign of success in studies. Seeing pastrami in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates the approach of her engagement and marriage to someone who loves her and wishes happiness in her life. Also, to see in a full dream a girl offering pastrami to people is a good omen and benefit and an indication that she will fulfill many desires. Walking on pastrami in a dream is full of unwanted visions that indicate that you are walking on the wrong path, immorality and sins. What is the interpretation of seeing pastrami for a married woman? The interpretation of a dream about completely consuming pork with pastrami is one of the unwanted visions that indicate falling into taboos, misfortunes and disasters. Eating delicious basturma in a dream for a married woman is evidence that she will get rid of problems and worries and that her life will change for the better. Seeing basturma with their husband in their bed in a complete dream is good news about the delicious food they will get and a sign of pregnancy and childbirth. What is the interpretation of seeing basturma for a pregnant woman? What is the interpretation of seeing whole pastrami in a dream for a pregnant woman? It is evidence of the ease of giving birth and exiting the pregnancy without problems or difficulties. Seeing pastrami in a dream indicates the means of life and happiness that she will enjoy after birth and is evidence that the child is free of diseases. What is the interpretation of seeing pastrami for a man? The interpretation of seeing completed pastrami in a dream for a man indicates great livelihood, lawful money, success, and success in tasks and projects. Eating whole pastrami in a dream for a young man is a sign of happiness, joys, and a great improvement in the future circumstances of his life. Seeing pastrami in a dream is full of good visions that indicate success. Success and freedom from worries. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself eating wheat?

title: Interpretation of seeing a wolf in a dream: is it good or bad?

preview.html:
The interpretation of seeing a wolf in a dream is good or bad, and some believe that it is a set of influences that a person experiences during his day to come and materialize for them at night. In your dreams, many believe that they are divine messages carrying symbols that indicate what lies in a person’s future. Interpretation of a dream about a wolf in a dream by Ibn SirinIt is known that the wolf is one of the strongest and fiercest animals in the animal world, and seeing it causes fear in reality, but what about those who see wolves in their dreams, This is what Imam Muhammad bin Sirin explained in his saying: Seeing a wolf in a dream completely portends a treacherous person or an unjust enemy of the viewer to his close friends. Whoever dreams in a complete dream that a wolf entered his house, then his vision shows that a thief entered his house. Someone for their sins. The dreamer’s vision of killing a wolf in a complete dream expresses his salvation from distress and worry and the defeat of the enemies around him, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a wolf chasing you in a dream indicates feelings of anxiety, extreme fear, and tension in one’s life, especially toward people in His life.Seeing a wolf bite in a dream means that someone will bear false witness against God, causing him great harm, in the form of going to prison or perhaps escaping from the police and leaving relatives and loved ones behind. A wolf attack in a dream is complete. Whoever dreams of being attacked by a wolf, the His vision indicates that there is a latent enemy in his life who seeks to harm him, harm him, and disturb him. In a man’s vision of a wolf that he could not catch and bite him, his vision expresses the presence of some people who speak against him with insulting words that insult him. Ibn Sirin also explained that a wolf in a dream is a cunning enemy. And a treacherous friend. A person’s vision of a wolf’s eyes is full of evil, as his vision shows that he is surrounded by the machinations and dangers of enemies. It symbolizes seeing a wolf attacking a person, causing injury or damage to one of his limbs. However, seeing a wolf in a dream completely and escaping from it is a scene worthy of praise because it expresses The viewer's ability to overcome all the problems and obstacles he faces in his life. A pack of wolves in a dream is complete. Seeing a pack of wolves or a group of wolves in a dream is complete, but the fortuneteller does not have an enemy, but rather a group of opponents and enemies, and the more wolves in the vision, the more The fortune teller worried. About his bad and really hurting him. This vision is a warning to its owner not to engage in good faith with everyone, especially with strangers, unless you are sure of the sincerity of your intentions towards him. This vision can also symbolize the presence of many problems and obstacles in the dreamer’s life, especially financial difficulties, which It will make him anxious, confused, and very uncomfortable in his life in general. This vision of the herd melting is a symbol of the threats and dangers that will surround the viewer in various aspects of his life in the coming period, including those that highlight the danger that threatens the stability of the emotional relationship and shared affairs with the partner. from.
ZOE.You killed a wolf in a dream. Seeing killing a wolf in a dream means many interpretations, the most important of which is that if one sees himself in a complete dream and kills a wolf and is in reality a highly religious person

title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a king by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a king: Among the dreams that have interpretations can be benign and can be a warning if this dream is seen by a girl who has never been married, or a married woman, or even a man, according to the greatest dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, and we will show you during the paragraphs of this article the most important interpretations. To see the death of the king in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a king: Seeing the death of a king in a dream, if the dreamer is sick, is a good omen that God Almighty will heal him soon and a sign of the abundance of livelihood that he will receive as soon as possible, and God knows best. There are dream interpreters who say that death The king in a dream is evidence that the truth returns to its owner and the dreamer triumphs over whoever wronged him, and God knows best. Seeing the death of the unjust king in a dream is evidence that he is in reality very unjust and people suffer from him as a result of that, and even wish for him to get rid of him, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Death The king in a dream is evidence that the dreamer does good deeds, such as giving alms and donating to every needy and poor person, and God knows best. The dreamer sitting with the dead king is a good sign that God Almighty will provide him with a lot of money after a deal he makes or an inheritance he obtains, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the death of the king by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing the king dying in a dream is a sign of goodness and joy that will come to the dreamer by the command of the Almighty, and God knows best. For a married woman to see in a dream that the king is dying, this is evidence that there are people close to her conspiring against her, and God knows best. And whoever sees In a dream, whether male or female, that the king died and the dreamer is sick, this indicates that recovery is near, and God knows best. The death of the ruler in a dream is a great concern for the dreamer, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about the death of the king by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen says that hearing The news of the king’s death in a dream and the people’s feeling of sadness due to his separation is evidence that this king is just and follows justice in his rule and wants to please God Almighty and that God Almighty is Most High and knows best. Better. The death of the king in a dream and not being buried is evidence of his long life. Whoever sees in a dream that the king died while walking in his funeral, it is evidence that the dreamer is one of the people who obey orders and follow the laws, and God knows best. The death of an unjust king in a dream is evidence of Imminent relief and an end to injustice, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for the death of a righteous king in a dream, it is evidence of the spread of corruption and injustice, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a king according to Al-Nabulsi: Ibn Al-Nabulsi says: The death of a king after a period of illness in a dream is evidence of avarice and avarice. Whoever sees the death of a king in In a dream, he is killed, this indicates that people oppose his tyranny and lack of justice, and God knows best. Seeing the death of the king by suffocation in a dream is evidence of his silence about the truth and follows every lie, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream the death of the king, this dream is a sign of loss of power and authority, and the dream may mean that The dreamer will lose, and God knows best. Seeing the king dying in a dream and people going to the funeral is evidence of the justice of the dreamer’s actions, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about the death of the king for a single woman, seeing an unmarried person.

Seeing the king dying in a dream and people going to the funeral is evidence of the justice of the dreamer’s actions, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: What is the meaning of crying in Ibn Sirin’s dream about a neighborhood?

preview.html: Crying in a dream over someone about Crying in a dream over someone about is one of the dreams that we see in abundance, to the point that we sometimes wake up and find tears streaming down our cheeks, without knowing the interpretations that this dream carries, so today we decided to list for you the different meanings that the dream offers. According to the opinion of leading dream interpretation scholars, crying in a dream over someone is mostly indicative of sadness, but sometimes it is the result of overwhelming joy that the person could not bear, so tears flowed from him as a form of expression of this joy, and according to the details of the dream, scholars had different opinions about it. . And here are the details: If you know this living person well, meet him every day, follow his life and progress, and see that you are crying for him, only then can you understand whether crying is an expression of happiness for him or brings him sorrow and pity. What's happening to him.For the person who you know you haven't spoken to in a while and you find yourself crying in your sleep about him, you need to call him and get his news because they are often in big trouble and need your help. As one of the people closest to his heart. Scientists have said that seeing you as a specific person is evidence that you think about them a lot, whether it is a life partner or a loyal friend. If he is one of your friends and he has suffered a lot in his life due to his inability to achieve himself or reach the ambitions and goals that He planned it in his imagination, until despair began to creep into him. Certainly, he needs a lot of moral support from you as one of his most important friends, and you must do your duty towards him to maintain your friendship. If the reason for the crying is emotional separation between the dreamer and the partner, while in reality they are not related Emotionally, the opinion of scholars in the interpretation says that the dream indicates your farewell to one of the prominent figures in your life who has a great place in your heart because of his decision to travel outside the country and not return for many years. Interpretation of a dream about a living person crying by Ibn Sirin. The vision and interpretation of crying differs from one person to another according to the form of that crying, whether it is in tears or in an unnecessarily loud voice, and other details, each of which has different meanings that we learn below: If the dreamer is crying for a living person whom he knows closely, and his crying was Without a sound, and only tears flowing without feeling sad, he is one of the preachers who express this person’s arrival at a desire dear to his heart. Which he really despairs of achieving, but it will come true in the coming days, causing wonderful changes in his life. The dreamer can provide good news to this person about the interpretation of his vision. But if there is screaming and wailing in tears, then unfortunately it expresses a serious illness that afflicts its owner and he must He takes care of him and does not hesitate to see a specialist until he is almost healed. If he sees him crying among a large number of people without making a sound, then he will soon attend a happy occasion related to this person, and it may be his wedding or the wedding of one of his loved ones. If the person is unknown to the dreamer, the vision It expresses the events that happen to the dreamer himself. If he finds his tears flowing without pain or worry, then...

Its victory over the people who are its enemies, and it will triumph over them, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of palm trees in a man’s dream: If a man sees a palm tree in a dream, this is evidence of recovery from illness and recovery soon, God willing. title: Interpretation of seeing the dead again in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the dead dead again in a dream. Some people want to know. The interpretation of seeing the dead dead again in a dream is one of the dreams that many wanted to know the interpretation of this dream. The site has nothing to do with interpretations, but rather with diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of seeing dead people again in a dream: In the event that you see a dead person dying again in a dream, this may indicate bad changes occurring to the dreamer, and God knows best. Dreaming of a dead person dying again, and it was There are shouts and screams that could indicate a problem that a family member encountered during this time, and God knows best. In the event that we see the death of a dead person in a dream, this may indicate a health problem that the dreamer or a member of his family may face during those days, and God knows best. In a state of mourning. If a deceased person sees his clothes torn in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be exposed to a financial crisis for some... Time. In the event that a person sees that the deceased has torn clothes, this may indicate the suffering that the dreamer suffered a lot in those days. Dreaming of a dead person whose clothes are torn in a dream may indicate bad events that the dreamer may face in his life in those days. Whoever sees in his dream that the dead person has torn his clothes, this indicates the severing of family ties in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dead person watering the crops in a dream: A dream about a deceased person watering the plants and his appearance is beautiful could indicate that the dreamer has achieved his goals and aspirations. In those days. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased was watering the plants may indicate good events that will come to the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased was watering the plants may indicate the high status that the dreamer will reach in those days with grace. God. And dreaming of a dead person watering plants in a dream may indicate the good things that the deceased left for his family and that he helped them a lot at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in wet clothes in a dream. Seeing dead people in wet clothes in a dream may indicate the dead person’s need for prayer and zakat at that time, and God. I know. Whoever sees in a dream that the dead person’s clothes are wet with water could indicate bad events that may happen to the dreamer in his life, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the dead person’s wet clothes in a dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer great difficulties and crises in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a paralyzed dead person in a dream. If one sees a paralyzed dead person in a dream, this could be a warning sign for the dreamer about the bad actions he is committing. It is possible that seeing a paralyzed father in a dream indicates his son’s misbehavior, stopping him, and repenting to God the Most High and Blessed. The dead person is paralyzed. In a dream, it could indicate that the dreamer has been afflicted with some health problems and obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life during this time, and God knows best. Who dreams of paralysis?

title: The 11+ most important interpretations of a dream about a mouse for single, pregnant and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a mouse by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees a mouse moving a lot in his rank, this indicates the abundant goodness that the fortuneteller will receive. Anyone who sees a mouse in his sleep during the day and it was playing and moving admirably, this is evidence of longevity. The person who sees in a dream that he is being killed A rat, indicates the presence of an evil woman in his life. A lot of rats inside a dream means a short life. A person who sees a rat coming out of his nose or vulva will have a bad student. A person who sees a load of rats coming out of his house, this indicates the poverty that the dreamer will find. Interpretation of a dream about a mouse for a single woman. The girl is single. Seeing mice in a dream is a sign of the fears that she feels. Mice in a dream for an unmarried woman indicate mistakes in her life. Whoever sees in a dream that a mouse has climbed a little from him, the woman is waiting for her. Interpretation of a dream about a mouse for a married womanMarried woman You see a big mouse in a dream. It is black in color, so you will lose a lot of money. A mouse in a dream for a married woman indicates a lack of livelihood. Many mice in the house indicate problems and fears. If a married woman sees that she is killing mice, this indicates that she will be relieved of worries. And the anxiety that she is exposed to. When she sees mice chasing her, this indicates that she is a good woman. Interpretation of seeing a mouse for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman. A mouse in a dream shows her fear of giving birth. Mice in a pregnancy dream is evidence of their excessive thinking about the place of birth. Interpretation of seeing a mouse for a person. The young man who sees the dream is that it is a group of mice. With it is evidence of a serious illness. If a man sees a mouse biting him in a dream, he will lose money and lose. A young man who sees a fat mouse in a dream indicates that he is eating forbidden money. A man who sees a mouse in his dream is an indication for him that someone is playing a trick. If A man saw that he was walking next to a large number of mice, then this is evidence of his sense of danger and instability. A mouse in a dream shows the man that he is not a good person and can steal. If a man sees a large mouse eating illicit money, and this matter must be reversed. What does it mean to kill a mouse? In a dream? Seeing mice in a dream is generally considered an undesirable dream, because it indicates the presence of enemy people who hate the dreamer in his life, but when you see that you are killing mice in a dream, this is a sign of your victory over your life. And God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. You saw a mouse eating your food in a dream. When one sees in a dream that there is a mouse eating his food, it may be a sign of close livelihood and high prices. It may be a sign of approaching marriage to a girl of morals and religion, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Add the dream that you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Quarrel with the deceased in a dream

preview.html: What if you find yourself arguing with a dead person? Want to know, read the rest of the article from gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing a quarrel with the deceased in a dream about a single girl. When an unmarried girl sees that she is arguing with a person or a friend, there was a quarrel between them in the dream. The vision showed the reconciliation that takes place between them, God willing. Or if she sees that she is arguing with her sister in a dream with a girl. The vision may indicate the lack of agreement between the two parties and perhaps the lack of a language of understanding between the two peoples. What if an unmarried woman sees that she is arguing with her brother while she is crying in the dream. The dream may indicate the existence of friendship. And a friendship between the dreamer and her brother in reality. And if he sees that he is arguing with an unknown deceased person he sees in the dream, about a girl. The vision indicates the presence of bad situations in the life of the dreamer. But if the unmarried girl sees that she is arguing with one of her deceased acquaintances in a dream. She will achieve what she desires. In her life with ambitions and the like. Seeing a quarrel with a dead father in an unmarried girl’s dream can be interpreted. Be careful of what she does in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of seeing a quarrel in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a quarrel with the deceased in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in The dream that she is arguing with a stranger. The vision indicated success in matters that she was deeply interested in. What if she saw that she was arguing with her dead father in a dream, to a married woman. The vision showed that there is someone who supports her in life and is very close to her. While if she sees A married woman dreams that she is arguing with her deceased mother. The dream may indicate that she needs to review issues related to raising her children. Or if she sees herself arguing with her dead neighbor in a married woman’s dream. She will receive goodness from this person’s people in reality. And in other sayings We see that seeing a fight with a dead person in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign of anticipating the actions and behaviors of the visionary. What if she sees herself speaking to the dead in a loud voice in a married woman’s dream. She can get what she expects in reality and it can indicate calm and stability. Interpretation Seeing a quarrel with a dead person in a dream about a man and its meaning. Seeing a quarrel with a dead person in a married man’s dream is one of the dreams that carry many meanings and symbols: such as seeing a fight with the dead and running away from it in a married man’s dream. The vision showed that the soul of the visionary is in a bad state, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married man sees that he quarreled with one of his relatives and left him in a dream, the dream may indicate the end of worries, problems and difficulties present in the dreamer’s life. The interpretation of a dream about quarrels with the dead is an accident in a married man’s dream. It indicates family problems between him and his family. Whereas if a man sees A married man in a dream is that he is arguing with his deceased wife. It is a token of the injustice that was done to his wife when she was awake when she was still alive. Seeing a quarrel with a dead person who was with him at work in a married man’s dream may symbolize. The vision showed some failure that the owner of the vision will face, and God The highest and most knowledgeable

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person being washed in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Washing the dead in a dream has different connotations in general, with some signs, warnings and good news. The interpretation is as follows: The dream of washing the dead The dreamer's dream heralds the end of the period of sadness and anxiety and getting rid of the feeling of tension and stress. If the dead person is known among people for his piety and righteousness, this dream may indicate that God has forgiven the dead person's sins. The dream of washing and shrouding the dead person suggests that the dreamer will participate in a show that is developing successfully and will be able to achieve a lot of profit and gain through it. If the dreamer sees himself washing a dead person, this indicates a very big problem that the dreamer will face or that he will lose someone dear to his heart. This appears if the dead person is washed with lukewarm water. The deceased's repentance is a consultation and his success in getting rid of the sins he committed before meeting his Lord, which reassures his loved ones of his good position in heaven. In some cases, washing the dead in a dream can indicate the contentment and prosperity in which the dreamer lives. If a person dreams that the dead person is washing him, this indicates the approaching date of the dreamer's death, and this dream warns him to repent to God Almighty and get rid of his sins until he meets the Lord of the Most High, the Pure. From sins. When the dreamer sees himself washing a dead person with hot water in the summer, there are bad things in the dreamer's scientific and practical life. If this is done in the winter, this indicates a blessing that will affect the dreamer's life from all sides and forms. The dream of washing the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted this dream in a positive way, as it brings good to the dreamer and comforts his heart, and the respected scholar says the following: This vision shows that Ibn Sirin The dreamer has overcome all the difficulties and problems that he was facing, which resulted in the person feeling sad, tense and stressed in the previous period. It also carries good in the dreamer's trade, and if he is a student, this indicates excellence and continuous success. Interpretation of seeing the dead washed in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Imam Al-Nabulsi came and interpreted this dream as follows: If the dreamer sees in a dream that there is a dead person washing, this means that this dreamer enjoys a happy life, moreover, God will bless him and help him in all the difficulties and problems in his life. Imam Al-Nabulsi indicated in his interpretation of this dream that it indicates that this dreamer has a hand in his repentance, and that this dream indicates Repentance. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the dead person asks him to wash him, this indicates that the dead person needs supplication and charity. If the dreamer sees in a dream that there is a dead person washing him, this is an indication that bad things will happen to the visionary and may also indicate the approaching death of the visionary. Imam Ibn Shaheen interpreted the dream of washing the dead in a dream as evidence of the success of the visionary, and it also indicates that the visionary will be able to get rid of these worries and problems in his academic and practical life. Interpretation of the dream of washing the dead according to some scholars Many scholars of interpretation have spoken about this vision and explained what is hidden in it of good and bad, and these interpretations are as follows: A large percentage of scholars of interpretation agreed that the vision
